title: Why do I begin to act like a child because of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is new to you and that is why it is overwhelming. That is okay, a lot of us get overwhelmed. I, personally feel technologically handicap because I am not good with the google sheets, forms, etc I make for my students. But I think it is okay. Once we get used to it, we will not be clumsy or overwhelmed while handling technology!

Well, even though i can not understand your entire situation which moved you to ask this question. The reason behind your behaviour changes can be linked to “what you eat is what you become”, so just change what you consume for your mind and you will see the difference.
